analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Hīnaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahīno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke aṭṭha …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hīnam hetum dhammam paṭicca na hīnaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke aṭṭha pe avigate terasa

original: Hīnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namajjhimo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hīnam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na majjhimaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava
